title: Supersymmetry of the extreme rotating toroidal black hole
abstract: We study the supersymmetry of the charged rotating toroidal black hole solutions found by Lemos and Zanchin, and show that the only configurations that are supersymmetric are: (i) the non-rotating electrically charged naked singularities already studied by Caldarelli and Klemm, and (ii) an extreme rotating toroidal black hole with zero magnetic and electric charges. For this latter case, the extreme uncharged black hole, we calculate the Killing spinors and show that the configuration preserves the same supersymmetries as the background spacetime.
